snippet.title: Azarine Heart Gameplay Trailer - 2024 Release!
snippet.description:
Will you be a pitiful thing, hardly fit for the dirt you crawl on, or will you rise up, and bear the suffering that Acadia will throw upon you, all to save her?
Thank you so much for watching; and thank you to Marcus Neely for his trailer music!
Azarine Heart offers a unique dive into the wicked and wild open world of Acadia, as you search the weathered countryside for not only your sister, but the cult that had kidnapped her, as well as countless other girls: mothers, sisters, daughters, wives. Will you be strong enough to save them? Or will you find yourself another forgotten body, wayside on the roads?
Join 7 factions and several followers willing to help you on your quest; for their own reasons or not. Will you become a bastion of goodness for a pitiful land needing mercy, or will you realize your power and wreak havoc over the weak and hapless?
Join me for the full release during the summer of 2024!

Steam link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2157290/Azarine_Heart/

Contact me:
Email: rowen.horton@gmail.com
Reddit: u/Upstairs-Tie-3541
